body:
As noted by @t-karatsu on [OpenFOAM issue 16719](https://develop.openfoam.com/Development/openfoam/-/issues/1671) the recipe does not find `mpi.h` for Fujitsu MPI.

The OpenFOAM recipe still uses  `prefix.include` from the mpi spec instead of `headers.directories` (as per the change #7267), which means that it does not find the mpi header buried a few levels deeper.
title: openfoam does not find fujitsu mpi header
